metadata.title: Law Minister extends greeting to Hindu community on Diwali

content.article_body:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 20 (APP):Federal Minister for Law and Justice Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar on Monday extended warm greetings to the Hindu community in Pakistan and around the world on the occasion of Diwali.

The Minister stated that Diwali, the festival of light and hope, symbolizes the triumph of good over evil and reminds us of the importance of harmony, respect, and peaceful coexistence.

He appreciated the valuable contributions of the Hindu community toward Pakistan's social, economic, and cultural development, emphasizing that their role continues to strengthen the national fabric.

Azam Nazeer Tarar reaffirmed the government's unwavering commitment to ensuring equal rights, religious freedom, and dignity for all citizens as enshrined in the Constitution of Pakistan.

He expressed his sincere wishes that the festival of lights brings joy, peace, and prosperity to everyone, and further strengthens the bonds of unity and mutual respect within our society.
